titles.title: When I Survey Life's Varied Scene (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When I survey life's varied scene Amid the darkest hours Sweet rays of comfort shine between And thorns are mixed with flowers{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord teach me to adore Thy hand From whence my comforts flow And let me in this desert land A glimpse of glory know{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Father whate'er of earthly bliss Thy sovereign hand denies Accepted at Thy throne of grace Let this petition rise{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give me a calm - a thankful heart From every murmur free The blessings of Thy grace impart And let me live to Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let the sweet hope that Thou art mine My life and death attend Thy Presence through my journey shine And crown my journey's end{/lang-eng}
